STRAIT OF SICILY.
VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
VICINITY 37-00N 012-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
